author: geirm
msg: AST changes to support the new context stuff.  This is the ASTA* classes (so we don't get all at once...)

author: geirm
msg: Removed - new impl w/ interface in o.a.v.context

author: geirm
msg: Implementaion of internal context interface, does the node-local introspection caching as well as carrying the template name through the AST.  Replaces o.a.v.InternalContext

author: geirm
msg: Context adapter for internal use in the AST, implements both app context methods as well as internal context methods.  Never for application use, this is created in Template.merge() and used during the template merge process.
